comments:
I was starting a new workspace using I20020517 and performed the following 
steps:
0. Switch to Java browsing perspective (although, the same thing happened in 
the resource perspective)
1. Disabled automatic build preference
2. Loaded team plugins from dev.eclipse.org
3. Imported other required plugins as binary projects
4. reenable automatic build
Nothing happened (i.e. no build occured) and the following exception was in the 
log.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 1 4 17/05/02 7:56 PM
